import Icon from "../../../components/Icon/Icon"; import { GlobalThemes } from "../../../ThemeManager"; import lolipop from "../../../assets/lolipop.jpg"; import candy from "../../../assets/candy.jpg"; import chocolate from "../../../assets/chocolate.jpg"; import cakeBalls from "../../../assets/cakeBalls.jpg"; import "./SalesTheme.scss"; import { useState } from "react"; enum SalesPage { Welcome, Selection, About, } const SalesTheme = ({}: {}) => { const [subPage, setSubPage] = useState(SalesPage.Welcome); return ( <>
setSubPage(SalesPage.Welcome)} >
Welcome
setSubPage(SalesPage.Selection)} >
Selection
setSubPage(SalesPage.About)} >
Story
{subPage === SalesPage.Welcome && (
Candy
Shop
Bringing you more candy!
Get Candy!
Santa's Elves
This week we have been visited by Santa's Elves! They've brought all their favorite treats along with them!
Kid's Day
Come on down with the whole family! We've setup stations for all the kids to learn how candy is made and even make their own!
Chocolate Lovers Day
Come in and explore the world of chocolate. We've set up booths with different chocolate vendors from around the world for you to come in and taste!
Cake Ball Decorating
Come on in and have some fun with the whole family! We have many different flavors and materials to decorate with so bring the kids!
Check out this candy making video we made to show you the dedication we take to the whole process!
)} {subPage === SalesPage.Selection && (
Candy
Shop
Bringing you more candy!
Get Candy!

This week we have been visited by Santa's Elves! They've brought all their favorite treats along with them!

Chocolate Lovers Day
Come in and explore the world of chocolate. We've set up booths with different chocolate vendors from around the world for you to come in and taste!
Cake Ball Decorating
Come on in and have some fun with the whole family! We have many different flavors and materials to decorate with so bring the kids!
Check out this candy making video we made to show you the dedication we take to the whole process!
)} {subPage === SalesPage.About && (
Candy
Shop
Bringing you more candy!
Get Candy!
Santa's Elves
This week we have been visited by Santa's Elves! They've brought all their favorite treats along with them!
Kid's Day
Come on down with the whole family! We've setup stations for all the kids to learn how candy is made and even make their own!
Chocolate Lovers Day
Come in and explore the world of chocolate. We've set up booths with different chocolate vendors from around the world for you to come in and taste!
Cake Ball Decorating
Come on in and have some fun with the whole family! We have many different flavors and materials to decorate with so bring the kids!
Check out this candy making video we made to show you the dedication we take to the whole process!
)} ); }; export default SalesTheme;
